inclusion.label: met
inclusion.evidence: The patient is a 60-year-old Spanish man

inclusion.label: not_met
inclusion.evidence: Patient received for the first time in Memory Consultation and not aware of his diagnosis

inclusion.label: met
inclusion.evidence: The patient has a Mini-Mental State Assessment score (MMSE) ≥ 20

inclusion.label: met
inclusion.evidence: Patient accompanied by a primary caregiver

inclusion.label: met
inclusion.evidence: The patient is able to provide consent to participate in research

inclusion.label: met
inclusion.evidence: Caregiver accompanies the patient and is considered as the main caregiver during the consultation, is able to provide consent to participate in research
